languages.text: "Полагаю, мне не остается ничего иного, кроме как покориться вашей воле. Я — законопослушный слуга Его и чту Лекс Империалис". {n}Медина бросает на вас быстрый взгляд.{/n} "Разве что {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость не имеет что сказать".

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, мне не остается ничего иного, кроме как покориться вашей воле. Я — законопослушный слуга Его и чту Лекс Империалис". {n}Медина бросает на вас быстрый взгляд.{/n} "Разве что {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость не имеет что сказать".

traits.locale_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

"It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

languages.text: "Offenbar bleibt mir nichts anderes übrig, als mich Eurem Willen zu beugen. Als Sein gesetzestreuer Diener ehre ich das Lex Imperia natürlich." {n}Medineh wirft dir einen kurzen Blick zu.{/n} "Es sei denn, {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} möchte etwas zu der Angelegenheit sagen."
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Offenbar bleibt mir nichts anderes übrig, als mich Eurem Willen zu beugen. Als Sein gesetzestreuer Diener ehre ich das Lex Imperia natürlich." {n}Medineh wirft dir einen kurzen Blick zu.{/n} "Es sei denn, {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} möchte etwas zu der Angelegenheit sagen."

languages.text: « Il semble que je n'ai d'autre choix que de céder à vos demandes. J'ai toujours honoré la Lex Imperialis dont je suis le respectueux serviteur. {n}Medihah vous jette un regard rapide.{/n} À moins que Sa Seigneurie y trouve à redire, bien entendu. »
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: « Il semble que je n'ai d'autre choix que de céder à vos demandes. J'ai toujours honoré la Lex Imperialis dont je suis le respectueux serviteur. {n}Medihah vous jette un regard rapide.{/n} À moins que Sa Seigneurie y trouve à redire, bien entendu. »

languages.text: «Parece que no me deja otra opción que acatar sus órdenes. Como súbdito leal y honrado que soy, honraré la letra de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Medineh te lanza una mirada furtiva.{/n} «A menos que {mf|milord|milady} tenga algo que añadir, claro está».
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que no me deja otra opción que acatar sus órdenes. Como súbdito leal y honrado que soy, honraré la letra de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Medineh te lanza una mirada furtiva.{/n} «A menos que {mf|milord|milady} tenga algo que añadir, claro está».

languages.text: “看来，我除了服从你的意愿之外，别无他法。我是帝皇遵纪守法的仆人，我谨遵帝国法典行事。”{n}梅迪涅快速瞥了你一眼。{/n}“除非大人对这件事情有其他个人看法。”
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: “看来，我除了服从你的意愿之外，别无他法。我是帝皇遵纪守法的仆人，我谨遵帝国法典行事。”{n}梅迪涅快速瞥了你一眼。{/n}“除非大人对这件事情有其他个人看法。”

languages.text: 「どうやら、あなたの命令に従うしかないようですな。陛下の法に従う忠実なしもべとして、レックス・インペリアを尊重しよう」{n}メディネは素早くこちらを一瞥した。{/n}「もっとも、この件について閣下が何か言いたいことがあるのなら別ですが」
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら、あなたの命令に従うしかないようですな。陛下の法に従う忠実なしもべとして、レックス・インペリアを尊重しよう」{n}メディネは素早くこちらを一瞥した。{/n}「もっとも、この件について閣下が何か言いたいことがあるのなら別ですが」

languages.text: "Anlaşılan iradenize itaat etmekten başka çarem yok. Kanunlar önünde boynu kıldan ince olan bir hizmetkâr olarak Lex İmperialis'e karşı asla saygıda kusur etmem." {n}Medineh, gözünün kenarından sana bakıyor.{/n} "Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bu meseleye dair söyleyeceği bir şey yoksa."
languages.original_text: "It seems I am left with no other option than to obey your will. As His law-abiding servant, I honour the word of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Medineh shoots you a quick glance.{/n} "Unless {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has anything to say on the matter, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşılan iradenize itaat etmekten başka çarem yok. Kanunlar önünde boynu kıldan ince olan bir hizmetkâr olarak Lex İmperialis'e karşı asla saygıda kusur etmem." {n}Medineh, gözünün kenarından sana bakıyor.{/n} "Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bu meseleye dair söyleyeceği bir şey yoksa."
